other_title: Dragon Ball Z Kai: The Final Chapters
opening_theme: “Kuu-Zen-Zetsu-Go (空•前•絶•後)” by Takayoshi Tanimoto (Dragon Soul)
ending_theme: #1: "Haikei, Tsuratsusutora (拝啓、ツラツストラ)" by Good Morning America (グッドモーニングアメリカ) (eps 1-13)
#2: "Junjou (純情)" by Leo Ieiri (家入レオ) (eps 14-25)
#5: "Don't Let Me Down" by Gacharic Spin (eps 49-61)
